class.name: DiscordActivityPartyPrivacy
class.brief_description: Allows your game to control the privacy of the party the user is in.

constants.constant: The party is private (or unknown), which means that the user is in a party but it is not joinable without sending a request to join the party. This is the default value. You will also receive this value when receiving other users' activities as the party privacy for other users is not exposed.

The party is public, which means that the user is in a party which [i]could[/i] be joinable by either friends or mutual voice participants without sending a request to join the party. This depends on a user's desired Discord account privacy settings.
